Rulings.HAT:
● If this card is not in the GY before this effect activates, it does not activate.
EG: This card is discarded to activate "Mermail Abysspike", and "D.D. Crow" is chained. This card does not activate.
Rulings.Vegas:
● If this card is not in the GY before this effect activates, it does not activate.
EG: This card is discarded to activate "Mermail Abysspike", and "D.D. Crow" is chained. This card does not activate.
Rulings.Meadowlands: ● Even if this card isn't in the GY, its effect still activates (this is a format specific ruling).
Rulings.FireWater:
● If this card is not in the GY before this effect activates, it does not activate.
EG: This card is discarded to activate "Mermail Abysspike", and "D.D. Crow" is chained. This card does not activate.

PSCT.Vegas:
① Level 3 or lower Sea-Serpents you control can attack directly. 
② If this card is sent to the GY to pay the cost of a WATER monster's effect: 
Add 1 Sea-Serpent from your Deck to your hand (except "Atlantean Dragoons").

PSCT.Base: All Level 3 or lower Sea Serpent-Type monsters you control can attack your opponent directly. When this card is sent to the Graveyard to activate a WATER monster's effect: Add 1 Sea Serpent-Type monster from your Deck to your hand, except "Atlantean Dragoons".
